title: BourbonStrawberryIcedTea
ingredients_key: Rich simple syrup (2 parts sugar, 1 part water)
recipe: Add the strawberries and lemon juice into a mixing glass and gently muddle.
Add the syrup and bourbon, fill the glass with ice, and shake until well-chilled.
Strain into a Collins glass over fresh ice.
Garnish with a mint sprig and skewered blueberries and strawberries.
